name: The Simpsons: Hit & Run
description:
The Simpsons: Hit & Run is an action-racing game developed by Radical Entertainment. It was originally released in 2003. Vivendi Universal Games published the game. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
You can play The Simpsons: Hit & Run on GameCube, PC, Xbox and PlayStation 2.
John Melchior produced the game. It was directed by Vlad Ceraldi. It was scored by Allan Levy, Jeff Tymoschuk and Marc Baril.
